summary: With this mod you can summon (and dismiss easily) 39 Pairs of Mounts in the Version 2.9 (The DLC DAWNGUARD is REQUIRED); 32 Pairs of Mounts in the Version 2.9 BIS (NO DLC REQUIRED); 50 Pairs of Mounts in the Version 3.0 TER (The DLCs DAWNGUARD and DRAGONBORN are REQUIRED)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b]Dual Summon Mounts[/b][/color][color=#00ff00][b] Version 2.9 (The DLC DAWNGUARD IS REQUIRED) 39 Pairs of Mounts [/b][/color]

With this mod you can summon (and dismiss easily)[color=#ff0000] TWO[/color] Mounts at a time: [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Armored Death Hounds, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Horses, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Lions, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Dwemer Mechanicals, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Armored Huskies, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color] Chaurus Hunters, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Mini Dragons, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Tigers, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Pandas, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Deer,[color=#ff0000] 2 [/color]Bunnies, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Gargoyles,[color=#ff0000] 2 [/color] Flame Atronachs, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color] Frost Atronachs, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color] Dwarven Centurions, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color] Vampire Lords, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color] Chickens, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Spriggans, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Falmers, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Skeletons, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Spectral Mounts, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Flying Mounts, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Wispmothers, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Crabs, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Trolls, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]"Werewolves", [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Horkers, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Wild Mammals, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Dragon Priests, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Exotic Mounts, [color=#ff0000]2[/color] Rats, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color] Goats, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Vale Mounts, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color] Storm Atronachs, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color] Chaurus, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color] Spiders, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color] Wolves, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color]Foxes, [color=#ff0000]2 [/color] Exotic Horses.

[color=#00ff00][b]Version 2.9 BIS (NO DLC REQUIRED) 32 Pairs of Mounts [/b][/color] (NO Armored Death Hounds, NO Armored Huskies, NO Chaurus Hunters, NO Gargoyles, NO Centurions, NO Vampire Lords, NO Vale Mounts)

[color=#00ff00][b]Version 3.0 TER (The DLC DAWNGUARD and DRAGONBORN are REQUIRED) 50 Pairs of Mounts [/b][/color] (This version adds [color=#ff8c00]2[/color] Bristlebacks, [color=#ff8c00]2[/color] Dwarven Mounts, [color=#ff8c00]2[/color] Silt Striders, [color=#ff8c00]2[/color] Solstheim Mounts, [color=#ff8c00]2[/color] Fire Mounts, [color=#ff8c00]2[/color] Chagohods, [color=#ff8c00]2[/color] Babies Silt Striders, [color=#ff8c00]2[/color] Healthy Skeevers with Skaven, [color=#ff8c00]2[/color] Mangy Skeevers with Skaven, [color=#ff8c00]2[/color] Old Horses, [color=#ff8c00]2[/color] Swamp Hounds)



[color=#00ff00] Optional Files: Esp Version Française [/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/wikC5y2.gif[/img]

[color=#00ff00] Miscellaneous Files: Adds New Unicorns and New Old Horses[/color] [i]With this (standalone) mod you can summon (and dismiss easily) 14 new Unicorns (7 Pairs) and 5 new Old Horses (2 Pairs + Darkness). NO DLC Required.[/i]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/qsMPE9H.gif[/img]

[i] To have the SUMMONABLE Mounts, you must buy the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”, at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude).

With the books, you have the spells (Duration of the summon: 1 hour) ...

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome:Dismiss Dual Summon" [/i]

[color=#ff0000] [b]And if you want to be accompanied by a companion, it is possible with the mod [/b] [/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13530/?] Horse Branding by fLokii [/url] (Easily mark any mount for followers to ride)

[color=#ff0000] [b]If you want to be accompanied by SEVERAL companions, it is possible with the mod [/b] [/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13530/?] Horse Branding by fLokii [/url] AND the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/4TgixgD.gif[/img]

->->[color=#00ff00]Some mounts are FLYING with wings (Vampire Lord and Chaurus Hunter) or with levitation (Mini Dragon, Vampire lord, Dwarven Eyebot, Soul Wisp, Dragon Priest)[/color]<-<-

[color=#00ff00][i] To FLY with Vampire Lords : (Z + Alt)

Just to LEVITATE: (Left Ctrl) (to stop: Left Ctrl again)

If you want to have a PERMANENTLY FLYING with your mount: (E) then run and fly with the mount (Z + Alt), then type on E to dismount: your mount is permanently flying ! (to stop: Left Ctrl) [/i][/color]

[b][i]Presentation of this mod (XBOX version)[/i]:[/b]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]dx9KGIusvpc[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[color=#ff0000] Video with the version 1.0[/color] (Thanks to Ruiuji)

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]3BlvSfOHAnE[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[color=#ff0000] Video with the version 1.1[/color] (Thanks to Nozi87)

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]4-ONk_5qaSU[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<--<-<-

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=348760Farengar6.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/348760Farengar6.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=593172ConjureTwoMounts3.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/593172ConjureTwoMounts3.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=799991Dismissmounts.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/799991Dismissmounts.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b] INSTALLATION[/b][/color] (very important)

[color=#00ff00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#00ff00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2) [color=#ff0000]You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game to obtain the 51 books (version TER)...(Normally, this is done automatically)[/color]

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! to obtain the books (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”,at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whitherun/Blancherive) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour

4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[color=#ff0000][b] Bugs or Problems[/b][/color]

When you mount Cernunnos/Gazella/Vale Deer, you must be patient a few seconds before moving !

If you dismount in the water with the Rabbits or the Chickens, it is possible to swim in the air !! Solution: MOUNT AGAIN or SPACEBAR

The Huskies have a hoarse voice ! ? (have you this bug ?)

DO NOT GO DOWN (E key) when you are running fast (4 legs) with the Daedroth and the Dwarven Punisher ....A solution: mount again and QUICKLY TYPE THE KEYS Z (W ?), E and ALT

Possible CTD in some locations when you dismiss (only !) the Dwarven mounts (version 3.0 TER).I think it is a problem with the Dwarven Ballista (have you this bug ?). Same bug in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31943/?]Dragonborn Conjuration Spells by KahjiitRaj [/url]

[color=#ff0000][b] Some other bugs (or problems) are fixed [/b] (ex: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YhRezz10NOo ]"swimming"[/url]) if you place the. esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game [/color]

[color=#ff0000][b]Credits[/b][/color]

1) For the Hell Hounds, The Long Armored Horse, The Armored Gazelle, The new Armored Husky and The Armored Tiger

[color=#ff0000]tumbajamba[/color] for the meshes and the textures of the Long Armored Horse, The Armored Gazelle, The Armored Tiger, The two Armored Death Hounds and the New Armored Huskies (« i decided to upload all my unreleased mount models as a modder resources ») in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8978/?]Armored SabreCat Mount [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Aenkill [/color] for the textures of the different colors of Huskies (Brown,Grey) in his mod [url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36021//?]Husky HD Recolor - Bran and Sceolang replacer [/url]("You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me") (+ the team: MangoMonkey "Unique Huskies Patch" and fix for "No Armors" mod; Edg3k tongue texture; Proxe -blenderartists.org- eye texture base).[color=#ff0000] PlagueHush [/color] for the retexture of the mod of Aenkill [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63598/?] Husky 2k Variants - An Automatic Variants Package [/url] "With Aenkill's permission I've repaired the alpha channel holes in the original textures, darkened the glowing white of the husky undercoat to something a little more realistic (and that works better with ENBs)" ("Just give us both credit") (only in 2.8.5TER)

If you like the Huskies you have also [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36187//? ] Husky Followers[/url] with 6 companions !

2) For The Lion, Lioness and the New Tiger

[color=#ff0000] FrankTheFish [/color] (Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12647 ]Prides of Skyrim [/url] ) for the Lion and the Lioness ( “You may use my Lions and other big cats as long as proper credit is given”).

The textures of lions are from [color=#ff0000] Bellyache [/color] ; Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621 ] Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack [/url]("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me").

New Lions and Lioness models from the team (-in the credits of FrankTheFish-):

"[color=#ff0000]Targaryen [/color](for the Mane of the lion)
[color=#ff0000]tumbajamba [/color](for the Tail)
[color=#ff0000]TreasureChest [/color](for the Teeth)
[color=#ff0000]DVAted [/color](for the effort of making the new model possible)"

3) For the Chaurus Hunters

[color=#ff0000]JSnider193[/color] for the new textures of the Chaurus Hunters ( Blood, Pebbled) in his mod (« Modders resources and tutorials »): [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6472/?]Critter Variants [/url] ("You can modify and use as needed")

4) For the Mini Dragons (Icewraiths)

All the bone, naga (Model from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3218604/? ] DigitalLion [/url]), and other dragon models that are rigged to the Ice Wraith skeleton were created and rigged by [color=#ff8c00] Dogtown1[/color] /[url=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Skymomod/514197991944324]Skymomod[/url] in the [url=http://bsnooch.com/forums/index.php?topic=822.0 ]Skyrim Monster Mod version 10 [/url]

The textures are from [color=#ff8c00] lifestorock[/color] in his[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24913 ] Skyrim Immersive Creatures[/url], Versions 2 and 3; and [color=#ff8c00] Bellyache[/color] in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20889 ]Bellyaches New Dragon Species and Ohdaviing Replacer[/url]

5) For the Armored Pandas

[color=#ff8c00]maymay1588[/color] for the meshes and the texture of the Dovahbears in his mod [url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30638 ]Dovahbear Companion [/url] by maymay1588 and zeroeternalz ; and [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/4851718-zachriel/ ]Zachriel [/url] for the texture of the Panda
(In "Permissions and credits" of this mod:"You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission or crediting me" and "All the assets in this file belong to the author, or are from free-to-use modder's resources ")

6) For the Rabbits

Thanks to [color=#ff0000]Chocolambot[/color] Mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4033#content ]HD Bunnies Rabbits with Different Shades [/url] for the texture of the "Light cream" bunny(“Asset use permission”:“ You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me”)

Thanks to[color=#ff0000] Mickyan[/color] with his Mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37982//?]Dovahbit of Caerbannog [/url] for the iron meshe (helmets) of its Dovahbits (Bunnies with helmets)

Thanks to [color=#ff0000]KANRAx2[/color] with the Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38138/?]yurufuwa rabbit [/url] ("Modders resources and tutorials") for the meshe and the textures of the Funwari Lopear Dutch rabbit

7) For the Chagohods, the Dwarven Gargoyle, the Dwarven Miner, the Dwarven Old Worker, the Dwarven Ripper, the Dwarven Smasher, the Dwarven Punisher, the Armored Daedroth, the Dwarven Eyebot, the Dwarven Empress, the Dwarven Worm, the Dwarven Sweeper, the Dwarven Charger, the Dwarven Droid, The Flame Spirit, The Swamp Hounds and the Silt Striders

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]Vicn [/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65134/?] Vicn Creature Pack [/url](”You can use any parts of this mod without my permission.”)

8) For the Chickens

The textures of Chickens are from [color=#ff0000] Bellyache [/color]; Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621 ] Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack [/url]("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me").

9) For the Crabs, Forest Spider and Kong

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]UlithiumDragon[/color] for his Dwarven Mudcrab in his mod (modder resource) [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/48180//?]Dwemer Mechanical Mudcrab [/url]

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00] Muppetpuppet[/color] for the meshes and the textures of the Rivercrab, Forest Spider and IMGA (Kong) in his mod:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9782/?]Moonpath to Elsweyr [/url] (« use everything you want »)

10) For the Horkers

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]Gendundrup [/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49682/?]Nexus Creature Resource[/url] (Skyrim "Modders resources and tutorials") for the 2 horkers .Meshes and textures of the Horkers are from [color=#ff8c00] frankthefish[/color] (thanks) in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37200/?]Horkers Of Skyrim [/url]

11) For the Dwemer Horse

[color=#ff8c00]Razorpony[/color] in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33321 ]Dwemer Steam Horse [/url]("Free modders resource" and "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me")

12) For the Rhino and the Elephant

Thanks to [color=#ff0000]Viltuska[/color] for The Meshe/Texture of the Rhino in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51550/?]Rhinos of Skyrim[/url]”This mod is also a modder's resource which means you can use and edit the contents of this mod freely as long as you aren't a douchebag and you give proper credit.”

Thanks to [color=#ff0000]Dogtown1 [/color] for The Meshe/Textures of the Elephant in [url=http://bsnooch.com/forums/index.php?topic=822.0 ]Skyrim Monster Mod version 10 [/url]

13) For the Dragon (Lady) priest, The Tree Cow and the Deer horse

[url=http://ux.getuploader.com/hissssaxmod001/download/23/hs-rat%28%E4%BB%AE%29.7z] hs-rat [/url]; [url=http://hissssa.cocolog-nifty.com/blog/]Blog of Hisssa [/url]

Thanks to [color=#ff0000] MrCasual [/color] for the Meshes of these creatures (with the 3 new weapons) in his mod

Textures of the Skeevers/Skaven by [color=#ff0000] Bellyache [/color] in his Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621 ] Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack [/url]("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me").

Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/532082/?] katkat [/url] in his mod [url=http://tesall.ru/files/file/7150-staraya-klyacha-dlya-geroya/]Старая кляча для героя/Old Horses [/url] and in his mod [url=http://tesall.ru/files/file/7158-edinorogi-dlya-halyavschikov/]Единороги для халявщиков/Unicorns [/url]

(Screen by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/532082/?] katkat [/url] in his original mod [url=http://tesall.ru/files/file/7158-edinorogi-dlya-halyavschikov/]Единороги для халявщиков/Unicorns [/url])

[color=#ff0000] Video with the version 2.8.1[/color] (Thanks to THE BAR GAMES)

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]Q_GqjhCjhYg[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-


This mod is also on the[url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198019117505/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850] Workshop/Steam [/url]



[color=#ff0000][size=4]Add-on: Adds New Unicorns and New Old Horses[/size][/color]

With this (standalone) mod you can summon (and dismiss easily) 14 new Unicorns (7 Pairs) and 5 new Old Horses (2 Pairs+ Darkness). NO DLC Required.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/QTYHUIE.gif[/img]

A big thank you to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/532082/?] katkat [/url]for its beautiful models in its mods [url=http://tesall.ru/files/file/7150-staraya-klyacha-dlya-geroya/]Старая кляча для героя/Old Horses [/url] and [url=http://tesall.ru/files/file/7158-edinorogi-dlya-halyavschikov/]Единороги для халявщиков/Unicorns [/url]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]HwzsLn8E6HE[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-
author: gg77

files.name: Esp Version Francaise 2-9 BIS No DLC version
Esp Version Francaise 3-0 TER Dawnguard and Dragonborn version
files.fileName: Esp Version Francaise 3-0 TER Dawnguard and Dragonborn version-50787-3-0TER.7z
files.changelogHtml:
New in Version 3.0 TER (only): Adds 2 Old Horses + 2 Swamp Hounds

All Versions 2.9: Improvement of the Lion horse (Unicorn)

New in Version 2.8.5 TER (only): Adds 4 Skeevers with Skavens

New in Version 2.8.3 TER (only): Adds Babies Silt Striders

New in Version 2.8.2 TER (only): Adds Chagohods (Chagohod + Chagohod Falmer)

New in Version 2.8.1/BIS/TER: A bug fixed, Now you can summon the Exotic Mounts, the Wild Mammals and the Silt Striders everywhere you want!

New in Version 2.8/BIS/TER: Adds Exotic Horses (Lion horse + Demon horse)

New in Version 2.7.1/BIS/TER: correction of a possible problem with the texture of the Pandas

New in Version 2.7TER: Adds Bristlebacks, Dwarven Mounts, Silt Striders, Solstheim Mounts, Fire Mounts

New in Version 2.7: Adds Vale Mounts, Storm Atronachs, Chaurus, Spiders, Wolves, Foxes

New in Version 2.1: Adds Goats (Domestic and Battle Goat)

Version 2.0.1: Correction of the allocation of the textures between rats and vanilla skeevers

New in Version 2.0: Adds Rats

New in Version 1.9: Adds Wild Mammals, Dragon Priests, Exotic Mounts

New in Version 1.6: Adds Trolls, Werewolves, Horkers

New in Version 1.5: Adds Spectral Mounts, Flying Mounts, Wispmothers, Crabs

New in Version 1.4: Adds Spriggans, Falmers, Skeletons

New in Version 1.3: Adds Frost Atronachs, Dwarven Centurions, Vampire Lords, Chickens

New in version 1.2: Adds Bunnies, Gargoyles, Flame Atronachs

New in version 1.1.2: a bug fixed with Cernunnos

Version 1.1.0: Armored Death Hounds, Horses, Lions, Dwemer Mechanicals, Armored Huskies, Chaurus Hunters, Mini Dragons, Tigers, Pandas, Deer
